item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
BAR

Thanks to the manager Frank and our very own Ed, specials are:

$4.00 - Draft Beers
$5.00 - Martinis


Your contact is: Jeanie (860)942-4708

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***

We are going to do a food drive at this Monday's Happy Hour. As we move closer to the winter season and with the current state of our economy, soup kitchens have an increased need for donations. Please bring nonperishable items to this week's happy hour. I will have some large bags and boxes to collect the donations and drop off at the Downtown Evening Soup Kitchen (DESK) later in the week. Just taking a few minutes at the store and spending a few dollars -like what you would spend on one drink- will help a lot of people in need out!!

The following is a list of items that DESK is currently in need of:

Adobo
Canned vegetables
Canned fruit
Peanut butter

Thank you for your support. See you at happy hour!!
